Room.Name: Panther Guard Headquarters
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Panther Guard headquarters, a city peacekeeping force.
Room.LongDescription: Young fighters use the headquarters as a training facility, but as they advance in level they need to go to a more professional establishment. You will learn some of the best street fighting techniques known to the guard here, but if you wish to advance to level three, you must go to Rudolph's over on Main Street in the Plaza.
